body:
Dear spack developers and users,

recently I am trying to install a software using spack to install a software (https://github.com/votca/csg/wiki/Installing#spack), when downloading the packages from GitHub, it asks me to give the GitHub account and password containing the source code. I am wondering if anyone knows what is the problem and how to solve it?

Thank you very much!
With best regards,
Shiyun
title: spack require GitHub account and password
